title: Day Two of Trump's U.K. Visit & Why Young Americans Love Socialism | Amber Scorah
itunes:title: Day Two of Trump's U.K. Visit & Why Young Americans Love Socialism | Amber Scorah
description:
President Trump downplays protests during his U.K. visit, Jaboukie Young-White chats about socialism with Bernie Sanders, and Amber Scorah discusses "Leaving the Witness."
